title: inanilujimi
author: inanilujimi
content: Hype altcoin that has very high transactions in 24 hours on eth blockchaindoes anyone know what is going on?I'm a bit surprised that many do a free mint on the token.referencehttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xen-crypto/markets/

comments.author: rendravolt
comments.body: Quote from: inanilujimi on October 10, 2022, 04:29:30 PMHype altcoin that has very high transactions in 24 hours on eth blockchaindoes anyone know what is going on?I'm a bit surprised that many do a free mint on the token.referencehttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xen-crypto/markets/The information that I know via twitter is that everyone can mint free XEN by simply paying the gas fee using ethereum, that's why the gas fee has increased to more than 50 gwei in recent days and the XEN smart contract address also ranks number 1 on etherscan almost 50% of those who make transactions within 24 hours.

comments.author: Easteregg69
comments.created_time: April 29, 2023, 07:36:31 AMLast edit: August 10, 2023, 12:28:06 PM by mprep
comments.body: I do LP on these ones. Fee is high. 1%.Don't put it on yobit as a paid listing! You read me!People mints it and burns the coins to get other coins. Where it is at now. X1 network coming Q1 2024. And the burners gets x1 coins on top.[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: firesurfer
comments.body: This project has potential for the next bull run in 2025. Definitely.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: inanilujimi on October 10, 2022, 04:29:30 PMHype altcoin that has very high transactions in 24 hours on eth blockchaindoes anyone know what is going on?I'm a bit surprised that many do a free mint on the token.referencehttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xen-crypto/markets/I am not really sure, what to think about that project to be honest. I also "reserved" some XEN with two different wallets on BSC that are ready to claim on november this year, but i know people that have made this with hundreds of different wallets on different blockchains. Since a few month or so you can mit those XENNfts that are basically multiple wallets worth of XEN. I also know people that have already minted hundred of those NFTs and spent more than 1000 $ of gas fees on it. On paper those people are millionaires now but once those tokens are ready to claim they are probably worthless.

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Nice investment with this coin by doing free mint, has possibility earn above $200 based on current price of XEN crypto coin at MEXC right now above $0.0000053895 and worth coins earn more than 30,000,000 for one years duration. Last mint with one month duration and I got XEN coins above 2,000,000 when price still higher and earned above $30 each wallet free mint. Right now still possibility for minting XEN crypto coins but I don't know will has bigger reward or increase down because many people get free mint this coins for one year duration. Still not late to free mints and prepare enough eth as fees transaction because XEN crypto coin with ERC20 network more profitable than BSC or Polygon network coins.

comments.author: FUCKBSVFUCK
comments.body: The most recent exchanges with altcoins which are offering hightransactions on the XEN token.  * https://etherscan.org/en/terms-and-conditions/  * https://www.blockcraig.com/terms/terms/documents/2020.6.6-1.

comments.author: Easteregg69
comments.body: I have grids down to 10 billion Xen per eth.Range 1-10.000.000.000 xen per eth. 1% fee grid. Uniswap LP.

comments.author: trunghai2805
comments.body: The project is succeeding in building their community. I can't predict how much its price will grow, but it's certain that it will grow due to the strong community. However, there's also the possibility that it's just a meme coin and nothing more.

comments.author: fantraun18h
comments.body: Offering free forging is definitely going to attract a lot of interested users. However, I'm certain that when I first heard about XEN, I didn't understand its purpose, growth potential, or how profitable the free forging might be, or if it's just a resource drain for the XEN forging application.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Can someone summarize what this is about and why would this be anything but waste of time and space? I can't se any use cases, just free minting and having no value.CMC says that it has marketcap of $1.2M if we take it with fully diluted marketcap. But their Self-reported circulating supply is 26.54T while Total supply being 3.85T. So what's up with that lol.Quote from: FUCKBSVFUCK on May 02, 2023, 11:47:55 AMThe most recent exchanges with altcoins which are offering hightransactions on the XEN token.  * https://etherscan.org/en/terms-and-conditions/  * https://www.blockcraig.com/terms/terms/documents/2020.6.6-1.Scam/phishing links ahead. Etherscan.io is the correct address for this, not org. I am not even going to check that other.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: This project is very similar to the most common scam. A project that has obvious problems with tokenomics. For a year of its existence, this token has never gained demand, only increasing the supply and thus lowering the price. A social token without any rounds of investment, in my opinion, now, has no advantages to carry your money there. DYOR.

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: Maybe the high transaction rate is because of the people doing free mint. Does anyone know the reason behind this XEN coin creation or the purpose of it?

comments.author: tad_ape
comments.body: the purpose of xen was to create a token that was and remains fair for anyone to create with only the use of current gas transactions as a cost. normally, smart contract tokens all have pre allocations or taxes on every transaction. whereas xen has no tax and no token allocations whatsoever. it is compared to being one of the fairest things every created since bitcoin and it is difficult to argue that claim, in regard to fairness and equal opportunity of acquiring it.it is deflationary and every day that goes by it is more difficult to mint the token due to the formula. not to mention gas on ethereum is rising, so this also ties to the value of xen. if gas goes high, one can expect the price of xen to pump. as it becomes more difficult to mine as the days go by, it also helps xen pump.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: rendravolt on October 10, 2022, 05:32:55 PMQuote from: inanilujimi on October 10, 2022, 04:29:30 PMHype altcoin that has very high transactions in 24 hours on eth blockchaindoes anyone know what is going on?I'm a bit surprised that many do a free mint on the token.referencehttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xen-crypto/markets/The information that I know via twitter is that everyone can mint free XEN by simply paying the gas fee using ethereum, that's why the gas fee has increased to more than 50 gwei in recent days and the XEN smart contract address also ranks number 1 on etherscan almost 50% of those who make transactions within 24 hours.that's what happened then , also the reason about the increasing in Fee of Ethereum network those days but I think that subsides now and yes  XEN seems to be the minting capital of many .Quote from: tad_ape on December 06, 2023, 11:19:54 PMthe purpose of xen was to create a token that was and remains fair for anyone to create with only the use of current gas transactions as a cost. normally, smart contract tokens all have pre allocations or taxes on every transaction. whereas xen has no tax and no token allocations whatsoever. it is compared to being one of the fairest things every created since bitcoin and it is difficult to argue that claim, in regard to fairness and equal opportunity of acquiring it.it is deflationary and every day that goes by it is more difficult to mint the token due to the formula. not to mention gas on ethereum is rising, so this also ties to the value of xen. if gas goes high, one can expect the price of xen to pump. as it becomes more difficult to mine as the days go by, it also helps xen pump.nice , thanks for this explanation as We are blind to what is this Minting all about and what XEN and why this was created as this booms last month .

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: So this coin has an unlimited supply, just heard the token today from this thread and it seems popular but I don't know the purposes of the token besides the token being deployed in other chain.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: For me, this crypto is quite risky because it has behind-the-scenes relationships with a lot of scammers, I don't care too much about how it's doing when a lot of things really don't make much sense to me and only exaggerate its ability to solve problems. Although the FOMO with XEN is quite impressive at times, at the end of the day, anyone who has ever had contact with HEX will understand how they operate, but it is not strange if, during a price increase, those behind can bring in another hype to push prices up.

comments.author: Easteregg69
comments.body: This one is absolutely the most fun to take dip on. Grid to 0 below price and your good.Lots of volatility. Mostly downwards. You end up owning the company some day. Cheers!Web 3 is about ownership. Don't forget.
